Tonsillectomy.context: Tonsillectomy, uvulopalatopharyngoplasty, and septoplasty for obstructive sleep apnea syndrome with hypertrophy of tonsils and of uvula and soft palate with deviation of nasal septum.

uvulopalatopharyngoplasty.context: Tonsillectomy, uvulopalatopharyngoplasty, and septoplasty for obstructive sleep apnea syndrome with hypertrophy of tonsils and of uvula and soft palate with deviation of nasal septum.

septoplasty.context: Tonsillectomy, uvulopalatopharyngoplasty, and septoplasty for obstructive sleep apnea syndrome with hypertrophy of tonsils and of uvula and soft palate with deviation of nasal septum.

obstructive sleep apnea syndrome.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome with hypertrophy of tonsils and of uvula and soft palate.

hypertrophy of tonsils.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome with hypertrophy of tonsils and of uvula and soft palate.

hypertrophy of uvula and soft palate.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome with hypertrophy of tonsils and of uvula and soft palate.

deviation of nasal septum.context: Postoperative Diagnosis: Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome with hypertrophy of tonsils and of uvula and soft palate with deviation of nasal septum.

51-year-old gentleman.context: This is a 51-year-old gentleman here with his wife.

loud snoring.context: She confirms the history of loud snoring at night with witnessed apnea.

witnessed apnea.context: She confirms the history of loud snoring at night with witnessed apnea.

moderate sleep apnea.context: The result of the sleep study was reviewed. This showed moderate sleep apnea with significant desaturation.

significant desaturation.context: The result of the sleep study was reviewed. This showed moderate sleep apnea with significant desaturation.

unable to tolerate treatment with CPAP.context: The patient was unable to tolerate treatment with CPAP.

large tonsils.context: At the office, we observed large tonsils and elongation and thickening of the uvula as well as redundant soft tissue of the palate.

elongation and thickening of the uvula.context: At the office, we observed large tonsils and elongation and thickening of the uvula as well as redundant soft tissue of the palate.

redundant soft tissue of the palate.context: At the office, we observed large tonsils and elongation and thickening of the uvula as well as redundant soft tissue of the palate.

tortuous appearance of the septum.context: A tortuous appearance of the septum also was observed.

no history of sinus infections.context: He has no history of sinus infections and does not recall a history of nasal trauma.

does not recall a history of nasal traum.context: He has no history of sinus infections and does not recall a history of nasal trauma.

General tracheal anesthetic.context: General tracheal anesthetic was administered by Dr. XYZ and Mr. Radke.

Afrin drops.context: Afrin drops were placed in both nostrils and a cottonoid soaked with Afrin was placed in each side of the nose.

very large tonsils.context: The tonsils were very large and touched the uvula.

relatively long and very thick uvula.context: The uvula was relatively long and very thick and there were redundant folds of soft palate mucosa and prominent posterior and anterior tonsillar pillars.

redundant folds of soft palate mucosa.context: The uvula was relatively long and very thick and there were redundant folds of soft palate mucosa and prominent posterior and anterior tonsillar pillars.

prominent posterior and anterior tonsill.context: The uvula was relatively long and very thick and there were redundant folds of soft palate mucosa and prominent posterior and anterior tonsillar pillars.

cryptic appearance of the tonsils.context: Also, there was a cryptic appearance of the tonsils but there was no acute redness or exudate.

no acute redness or exudate.context: Also, there was a cryptic appearance of the tonsils but there was no acute redness or exudate.

no adenoid tissue present.context: Retraction of the soft palate permitted evaluation of the nasopharynx with the mirror and the choanae were patent and there was no adenoid tissue present.

very crowded pharynx.context: A very crowded pharynx was appreciated.

electrodissection technique.context: The tonsils were first removed using electrodissection technique.

0.25% Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrin.context: The tonsil fossae were injected with 0.25% Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrine.

blunt needle tip electrocautery.context: We switched over from the Bayonet cautery to the blunt needle tip electrocautery.

suction electrocautery.context: The uvular artery just to the right of the midline was controlled with the suction electrocautery.

3-0 chromic catgut sutures.context: Closure of the soft palate wound was then accomplished with interrupted 3-0 chromic catgut sutures.

much improved appearance of the orophary.context: A much improved appearance of the oropharynx with a greatly improved airway was appreciated.

inferior turbinates were large.context: Speculum exam showed the inferior turbinates were large, the septum was tortuous and it angulated to the right and then sharply bent back to the left.

septum was tortuous.context: Speculum exam showed the inferior turbinates were large, the septum was tortuous and it angulated to the right and then sharply bent back to the left.

angulated to the right and then sharply.context: Speculum exam showed the inferior turbinates were large, the septum was tortuous and it angulated to the right and then sharply bent back to the left.

no evidence of purulent secretion or pol.context: I observed no evidence of purulent secretion or polyp formation within the nostrils.

much more patent nasal airway.context: The inferior turbinates were then both outfractured using a knife handle, and now there was a much more patent nasal airway on both sides.

good support for the nasal tip and the d.context: There was good support for the nasal tip and the dorsum and there was good hemostasis within the nose.

Polysporin ointment.context: Polysporin ointment was introduced into both nostrils.

moderate amount of clear fluid suctioned.context: An orogastric tube was placed and a moderate amount of clear fluid suctioned from the stomach and this tube was removed.

moving air well.context: In the recovery room, I observed that he was moving air well and I spoke with his wife about the findings of surgery.
